title: Ivanka Trump and Marla Maples wish Tiffany Trump a happy 26th birthday
text:
It is Tiffany Trump’s 26th birthday, and the Georgetown Law School student is getting birthday messages from all across social media — a few of them coming from some famous members of her large family. The younger of the president’s two daughters made well known to her million Instagram followers that today is her birthday by sharing many of the birthday messages she got on her Insta story.

Ivanka Trump posted a throwback in honor of her baby sister’s 26th.

Tiffany’s mom, Marla Maples, posted numerous Instagram stories all about her daughter’s birthday, telling followers that she was heading to Washington, D.C. to see the birthday girl:

Tiffany Trump’s boyfriend, Michael Boulos, also paid homage to the birthday girl with a series of stories showing photos of them together all over the world. “Happy birthday to the most amazing girl!” he wrote. “Love you!”

Michael Boulous birthday post More
description: Tiffany Trump, who is turning 26, fielded birthday love from a few of her famous family members.
